headline: Will Coca-Cola's Proven Pricing Power Help Its Stock Soar? Here's What History Says.
summary: Economic worries, prompted by ongoing uncertainty about how tariff announcements will ultimately play out, are scaring investors.  The global beverage giant has seen its shares rise 17% this year thanks to steady financial performance that investors might appreciate more these days.  In times like now, it's reassuring to know that Coca-Cola can raise prices on its products.
